description:
Being the generation best prepared ever when it comes to knowledge brings a lot of opportunities and also responsibility. But it takes more than technical skills and knowledge to shape the future of tech.
This short conference will take place as part of ICPC World Finals, gathering national and international speakers to discuss the future of tech talent and skills.
Join us to be part of the discussion, but also to meet the ICPC community.
Agenda and speakers will be released soon. Stay tuned!
name: Developing skills for the future tech industry
